snippet: Brig. Gen. Tammy S. Smith acknowledged her homosexuality by having her wife pin her star to her uniform.
abstract: Brigadier General Tammy S Smith has her wife Tracey Hepner pin star on her uniform during ceremony promoting her to brigadier general, and in doing so becomes the first openly gay officer of flag rank in the United States military.
lead_paragraph: Brig. Gen. Tammy S. Smith acknowledged her homosexuality by having her wife pin her star to her uniform.

headline.seo: Army Woman Is First Openly Gay Officer Promoted to Flag Rank
headline.main: Woman Becomes First Openly Gay General
headline.print_headline: Woman Becomes First Openly Gay General

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
